display_title: Cottage Cheese Protein Muffins Pack | Ultra High Protein

tables.title: The Blender Method
rows: Add cottage cheese + eggs to blender. Blend 30 seconds until smooth.
Add dry ingredients. Blend 10 more seconds. Don't over-blend.
Pour into pan. Bake at 350 deg F for 18-20 minutes. Done!
